description:
What is Extreme Programming (XP) and how can it be revolutionary for your business? Join Principal Application Engineer Ian McLaughlin for a tour of how Discover® uses XP including Pairing, Behavior-Driven Development (BDD), and Test-Driven Development (TDD), and learn how you can benefit from adopting these practices. Extreme Programming puts quality first when creating industry-leading products. Learn from Ian’s many years of lived experience as he details challenges faced and strategies used to overcome them. See how adopting XP can protect your business from falling victim to an IT catastrophe.


Discover Financial Services is a multi-billion-dollar company providing banking and credit products that are household names in the United States. Our mission is to help people spend smarter, manage debt better, and save more to achieve a brighter financial future.
title: Extreme Programming at Discover
